title: [K-12] Audio-Based Science Simulation Learning: Multimedia Educational Material Design

context.prior_knowledge: General foundational understanding of basic scientific concepts
context.additional_context: Providing audio-centric learning content accessible via smartphones, requiring offline synchronization features considering internet connectivity constraints

learning_goals: Learners can understand and summarize audio explanations of scientific phenomena with 90% accuracy.
Learners can perform science experiments with over 80% accuracy by following audio instructions in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can propose creative solutions to scientific problems based on audio learning content with over 70% success.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
